title: Video recording metadata template template schema
description: Video recording metadata template template schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54

propertyDescriptions.Video Recording Metadata: Metadata describing the video recording data.
propertyDescriptions.Acquisition System Metadata: nformation about the hardware and software of the data acquisition system.

items.title: Video Recording Metadata field schema
items.description: Video Recording Metadata field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54

propertyDescriptions.fileFormat: The format of the video file, such as, "MP4", "AVI", "MOV", etc.
propertyDescriptions.videoCodec: If the video is compressed, what codec was used. Enter none if not applicable.
propertyDescriptions.videoSource: The source of the video file, for instance, "Camera [name]", "Screen capture", etc.
propertyDescriptions.videoResolutionWidth: The resolution width of the video file in pixels.
propertyDescriptions.videoAspectRatio: The aspect ratio of the video file, in the format, width:height
propertyDescriptions.videoResolutionHeight: The resolution height of the video file in pixels.

videoSource.description: videoSource field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54

videoSource.schema:description: The source of the video file, for instance, "Camera [name]", "Screen capture", etc.

videoResolutionWidth.description: videoResolutionWidth field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54
videoResolutionWidth.schema:name: videoResolutionWidth
videoResolutionWidth.schema:description: The resolution width of the video file in pixels.

videoAspectRatio.description: videoAspectRatio field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54
videoAspectRatio.schema:name: videoAspectRatio
videoAspectRatio.schema:description: The aspect ratio of the video file, in the format, width:height

videoResolutionHeight.description: videoResolutionHeight field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54
videoResolutionHeight.schema:name: videoResolutionHeight
videoResolutionHeight.schema:description: The resolution height of the video file in pixels.

Acquisition System Metadata.title: Data acquisition system metadata element schema
Acquisition System Metadata.description: Data acquisition system metadata element schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54

propertyDescriptions.powerLineFrequency: Frequency (in Hz) of the power line at the setup location.
propertyDescriptions.manufacturerModelName: Name of the data acquisition system used.
propertyDescriptions.manufacturerModelVersion: Version of the data acquisition system.
propertyDescriptions.recordingSetupCustomName: Custom name of the data acquis
propertyDescriptions.4d07fc98-7550-4d3b-b2b2-cdf09358a757: Custom name of the data acquisition system.
propertyDescriptions.institutionName: The name of the institution where data is recorded.
propertyDescriptions.institutionAddress: The address of the institution where data is recorded.
propertyDescriptions.samplingFrequency: Internal (maximum) sampling frequency of the AR recording.
propertyDescriptions.deviceSerialNumber: The serial number of the components of the setup, recommended to add serial numbers and versions of ALL components constituting the setup.
propertyDescriptions.usesSoftwareSuite: Software suite used for data acquisition.
propertyDescriptions.systemCreator: Name of the person(s) who set up the system.
propertyDescriptions.systemMaintainer: Name of the person(s) who maintains the system.
